ca.ualberta.taskr

Class EditUserActivity

  • ca.ualberta.taskr.EditUserActivity

  • public class EditUserActivity

    This Activity allows for the creation and editing of a class User

    See Also:
    class User

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean CheckEmailFormatting(java.lang.String Email)
      Returns true if email address is valid.
      boolean CheckPhoneNumberFormatting(java.lang.String PhoneNumber)
      Returns true if phone number is valid.
      void UpdateUser(User user)
      Update the current user's information on the server using async network calls. If new user, the new class User object to the server. If successful, current username and class User object are stored to shared preferences. If existing user, update class User object on server and the user info is similarly saved to shared preferences. Otherwise, updated class User object is stored locally until server connectivity is established.

      Button for confirming changes and terminating activity.

      • onApplyChangesClicked

        public void onApplyChangesClicked()

        Apply inputted user information to class User object, then update the current user information in saved preferences. Inputted info is checked and an error message is displayed instead if some of the information is invalid.

        See Also:
        class User

      • UpdateUser

        public void UpdateUser(User user)

        Update the current user's information on the server using async network calls. If new user, the new class User object to the server. If successful, current username and class User object are stored to shared preferences. If existing user, update class User object on server and the user info is similarly saved to shared preferences. Otherwise, updated class User object is stored locally until server connectivity is established.

        Parameters:
        user - The user object to get updated
        See Also:
        class User, class User, class User, class User, class GenerateRetrofit, class CachingRetrofit, class UserController

        public void onPhotoClicked()

      • onActivityResult

        public void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                             int resultCode,
                             android.content.Intent data)

        Obtains image provided by user via MediaStore image capture activity, updates profile image on screen to provided image, then encodes the photo as a string.

        Parameters:
        requestCode -
        resultCode -
        data -
        See Also:
        MediaStore, MediaStore, class PhotoConversion
